item.title: Do you like Jagex/RS?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“rspoon, post:20, topic:148315”]I do like Jagex, to be honest. Sure, they are a big company now, and with that comes automated responses and things.

But, when you say they don’t listen to you, THEY DO!

Like with Pest Control, People begged soooo much for there to be boats for seperate levels.

Jagex did it. But, they changed the xp difference, etc. It is Jagex’s game. Now, when people cant achieve things super fast now by PC, they get on Rants and spam all day.

Pest Control was meant to be a game of rewards and fun, not super fast XP.

Anyways, this is just an example.

Jagex does their best.[/quote]This is an example of a smart man.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you like Jagex/RS?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“rspoon, post:20, topic:148315”]I do like Jagex, to be honest. Sure, they are a big company now, and with that comes automated responses and things.

But, when you say they don’t listen to you, THEY DO!

Like with Pest Control, People begged soooo much for there to be boats for seperate levels.

Jagex did it. But, they changed the xp difference, etc. It is Jagex’s game. Now, when people cant achieve things super fast now by PC, they get on Rants and spam all day.

Pest Control was meant to be a game of rewards and fun, not super fast XP.

Anyways, this is just an example.

Jagex does their best.[/quote]

lol maybe when 200k+ people complain about 1 thing and there are 10 threads with 2k posts on all of them they consider it. And thats just to change one small thing in the game such as what they did for pc. They listen to nothing really. They just run there game and make it look good and play good and easy to use so idiots will pay them. They dont care about what you want they just say they do.

Read full topic

I do like Jagex, to be honest. Sure, they are a big company now, and with that comes automated responses and things.

Like with Pest Control, People begged soooo much for there to be boats for seperate levels.

Jagex did it. But, they changed the xp difference, etc. It is Jagex’s game. Now, when people cant achieve things super fast now by PC, they get on Rants and spam all day.

Pest Control was meant to be a game of rewards and fun, not super fast XP.

Anyways, this is just an example.

item.title: Do you like Jagex/RS?

@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:17, topic:148315”]Theyr’e cunts and i hate them. They should seriously consider loosening up their rules, they ban people that waste their time and money with their shitty game and ban their customers. Some day they are gonna go bankrupt, when they do I’ll go kick Andrew Gower in the balls.[/quote]This day will never come, Runescape will either just leave or keep going forever. I don’t see it ever ending.

item.title: Do you like Jagex/RS?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

exe626:

Erm, I don’t hate Jagex. I don’t see why people who literally fell in-love with a game can claim to hate something they love(d) so much.

lemme rephrase that i hate jagex rs is a ok game and i never loved it was another game to play. like guild wars. Also jagex is out for me and my friend now. Friend was scamming money off of some crap he does and he got 5 of his mules with like 5-15m on ea banned within a hour of ea other

Read full topic
